channel.title: Last karmascape I made before I stopped coding my source
channel.description:
Hello Guys, I stopped hosting karmascape 9 months ago, so i've lost all of my pictures since... So i really cant add them :(
But here's the source http://www.mediafire.com/?m9ws1pwgo31jl2q
The client had never got to the stage of developing due to me having to focus on Source/GCSES/NVQS/Hw/Catering... Yeah alot of things. ill try! and get some pics from my old players. No promises though guys.
if it comes to requiring a client download the insidiax client or impozzes V2 client just as a replacement :)
Hope you guys enjoy. :)!!

But here’s the source
http://google.com/KAR9z

The client had never got to the stage of developing due to me having to focus on Source/GCSES/NVQS/Hw/Catering… Yeah alot of things. ill try! and get some pics from my old players. No promises though guys.

Hope you guys enjoy.
